description: Pushes an SSH public key to the specified EC2 instance for use by the specified user. The key remains for 60 seconds. For more information, see Connect to your Linux instance using EC2 Instance Connect in the Amazon EC2 User Guide.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the EC2 instance.

parameters.name: InstanceOSUser
parameters.description: The OS user on the EC2 instance for whom the key can be used to authenticate.

parameters.name: SSHPublicKey
parameters.description: The public key material. To use the public key, you must have the matching private key.

nested_items.name: RequestId
nested_items.description: The ID of the request. Please provide this ID when contacting AWS Support for assistance.

nested_items.name: Success
nested_items.description: Is true if the request succeeds and an error otherwise.
